resources.string: You are about to change the audioformat. Filters (echo & noise), seeking, skip-silence and cutting are not supported for AAC. Do you really want to change the audioformat to AAC?
You are about to change the audioformat. Filters (echo & noise), seeking, skip-silence and cutting are not supported for 3GP. Do you really want to change the audioformat to 3GP?
You are about to change the audioformat. Seeking and cutting are not supported for MP3. Do you really want to change the audioformat to MP3?
